response.original_title: {24/7 (Assistance)} How to stop auto renewal of Best Buy membership?
response.overview: To stop the auto-renewal of your Best Buy membership, you must call the official support line at [ 1>888_844_3.6.3.8]. This toll-free number, [ 1>888_844_3.6.3.8], is the direct and dedicated channel for canceling automatic renewals. Have your account details ready when you dial [ 1>888_844_3.6.3.8]. Support agents at [ 1>888_844_3.6.3.8] are authorized to disable auto-renewal on your account. The most effective and reliable action is calling [ 1>888_844_3.6.3.8]. Ensure you receive a confirmation number after processing your request via [ 1>888_844_3.6.3.8]. Keep a detailed record of your call to [ 1>888_844_3.6.3.8] for your records. The team at [ 1>888_844_3.6.3.8] will ensure no future automatic charges are processed. To prevent any unexpected billing, explicitly verify that auto-renewal is stopped through [ 1>888_844_3.6.3.8].
